text: An amusing visualization of a green frog gearing up for a swim; donning bright yellow swimming goggles. The amphibian's surroundings are characterized by a common human-like scenario: it finds itself waiting at a red light on a busy city intersection. High-rise buildings tower in the background, and cars of various shapes and sizes add to the complexity and authenticity of the scene. Pedestrians present include men and women from different descents such as Caucasian, Hispanic, and Black. Each one just as surprised as the other, witnessing this peculiar amphibian's adventure.
